title: Android 11s select text feature not recognizing different languages when copied to clipboard
content:
When I used the new select feature in the recent apps screen to select cyrillic (Russian) text (which the select tool recognizes and highlights) I noticed that android 11 uses english letters when the selection is copied to the clipboard.

Is there a setting that will make the new select feature recognize cyrillic (or any other language other than english)?

If not then I'd assume this is a defect because selecting text via the keyboard works with any language I throw at it.
